restaurants.name: MINE / WINE
restaurants.description: Authentic Italian cuisine with a modern twist. Enjoy a variety of dishes including Tortelli with Burrata and Truffle, Vitello Tonnato, and house Prosecco.

restaurants.name: 893 Ryōtei
restaurants.description: Experience fine dining with meat and fish dishes. Enjoy a relaxed atmosphere and top-notch interior design.

restaurants.name: Knödelwirtschaft
restaurants.description: Indulge in a variety of dumplings including Bacon, Spinach-Ricotta, and Vegan Tofu-Mushroom, served with salad. Save room for dessert – Grießknödel with Apricot Compote awaits!

restaurants.name: Heimweh
restaurants.description: Enjoy giant Kumpir loaded with various toppings including couscous, grilled vegetables, and homemade sauces. Options available for both meat lovers and vegans.

restaurants.name: Il Ritrovo
restaurants.description: Discover authentic Italian pizzas served in a lively atmosphere. Friendly service and generous portions await you.

restaurants.name: Nobelhart & Schmutzig
restaurants.description: Experience fine dining with a focus on local and seasonal ingredients. Enjoy a 6-course menu with excellent wine pairings.

restaurants.name: Kink Bar & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Enjoy delicious food and drinks in a stylish setting. Seasonal and regional dishes await you on the menu.

restaurants.name: Hallmann & Klee
restaurants.description: Indulge in honest good food made with high-quality ingredients sourced from local producers. Monthly changing menus offer a variety of options.

restaurants.name: PeterPaul
restaurants.description: Experience German classics in tapas size. Enjoy dishes like Königsberger Klopse, Fish Fingers, and Vegan Dumplings.

restaurants.name: Goldies
restaurants.description: Savor delicious fries with various toppings including Peking Duck, Roast Beef, and Sicilian Caponata. Chicken Bites are also available.

restaurants.name: Made in China
restaurants.description: Discover traditional Chinese dim sum and other specialties in a unique setting. Enjoy authentic flavors and a welcoming atmosphere.
